column3: Cannot operate/launch without it. Required for legal compliance, core infrastructure, or safety-critical features. Budget immediately (0-3 months).
Needed for quality, compliance, or scale. Professional services at user milestones. Plan within 6-12 months or triggered by growth.
Beneficial but timing is flexible. Marketing tools (wait for revenue), enhanced features, professional services (can DIY initially). Plan 12-24 months or revenue-triggered.
Speculative or far-future. Enterprise features, international expansion, significant team scaling. Consider only at 24+ months or major pivot.

column10: Notes
Local tech/startup meetups, mental health networking. Post-revenue. Optional.
Mental Health America, philosophy associations, app developer groups. Annual memberships. Post-revenue. Optional.

AI-assisted legal package... | Minimal legal package: AI drafts Privacy Policy, ToS, disclaimers ($0). Optional 1-hr lawyer review for sanity check ($300-500). HIPAA consultation unnecessary - architecture already confirms no PHI transmission. Full legal review deferred until revenue/scale justifies. Most indie apps launch with $0 legal spend.

AI-assisted security audit... | DIY security validation: Free tools (Snyk, GitHub Dependabot, CodeQL) + AI code review ($0). Supabase and Expo provide infrastructure security. AES-256-GCM encryption already implemented. Optional: 1-2 hr professional spot-check on encryption ($300-500). Full audit deferred until scale/enterprise needs. Most indie apps launch with $0 audit spend.
Affirmative opt-in consent UI (CCPA/VCDPA requirement for sensitive health data), consent audit trail, legal review of consent language. Launch requirement.

Annual security audit, post-major-release reviews... | AI-assisted annual audit: AI pre-scan + human expert review. Every 18-24 months after Year 1. AI tools reduce scope and cost by 30-50% compared to traditional audits. Quality and compliance maintenance.

Consolidated ongoing legal services: (1) Quarterly privacy policy reviews and state law monitoring (CCPA/VCDPA updates); (2) App Store privacy label updates for new features (Privacy Nutrition Label, Data Safety Section); (3) Regulatory change reviews; (4) Ad-hoc consultations as needed. Hourly rate model ($300-500/hr, ~5-8 hrs/year) more cost-effective than retainer for solo dev. Replaces separate Privacy Law Compliance, App Store Privacy Compliance, and Legal Counsel line items.

Incident response plan development... | AI-assisted IR planning: AI drafts incident response plan, breach notification templates, vendor coordination procedures. Security expert reviews and validates - $300-700 (1-2 hrs). Should have before significant user base.
k-anonymity validation library, differential privacy implementation, PHI detection system. Tooling cost: $0-1000 (OSS libraries). Development time AI-accelerable. Quality assurance.
NOT needed for consumer app. Annual certification cost if pursuing B2B/enterprise healthcare partnerships. Verify Supabase has SOC 2 Type II (no cost to Being).

Annual IR plan testing, plan updates for regulatory changes. Can reduce cyber insurance premiums by 10-20%. |AI-assisted IR maintenance: AI updates incident response plan for regulatory changes, generates test scenarios, refreshes notification templates. Human review 1-2 hrs/year - $200-500. Annual IR plan testing. Can reduce cyber insurance premiums by 10-20%
FREE government service. Native integration via tel: link. No external partnership needed. Continuous availability. Safety-critical feature.
Future feature. In-app help, FAQs, troubleshooting guides. Development time (your time). Nice-to-have.

NOT currently integrated. Recommended at 5K+ users or $50K MRR. Zendesk Suite Team $49/agent/mo to Professional $99/agent/mo. | AI-first support strategy: Start with AI chatbot integration (Intercom Fin, Crisp AI, or custom Claude-based - $0-30/mo) for Tier 1 support. Escalate to Zendesk ($49-99/agent/mo) only when AI deflection rate insufficient. Recommended at 5K+ users or $50K MRR. AI-first approach may delay need to 10K+ users.

Part-time support for user inquiries, technical issues. Scales with user base. Trigger: 5K users. | AI-augmented support model: AI handles Tier 1 inquiries (FAQs, basic troubleshooting, account issues). Human agent for Tier 2 escalations, complex issues, sensitive mental health concerns. AI-first strategy delays human support need. Trigger: 10K+ users (was 5K without AI). Scales with user base
NOT currently implemented. Recommended for user retention. SendGrid Essentials $15/mo (40K emails) to Mailchimp $50/mo. Revenue-dependent.

App icon ($100-500) + screenshots ($200-800) for iOS + Android. Consider DIY with Figma to reduce to $0. Launch requirement. One-time design. | AI-assisted App Store assets: App icon - AI generation (Midjourney/DALL-E $0-20) + Figma refinement, or freelancer ($100-500); Screenshots - AI-assisted mockup tools (Rotato, AppMockUp) + Canva AI ($0-100), or freelancer ($200-500). Total $0-500 with AI DIY vs $300-1,300 traditional. Launch requirement. One-time design.
Updates per major release (2-4/year). $100-300 per update. Quality maintenance. AI tools can reduce to $50-150/update (same tools as initial assets)

Freelancer for logo suite... | AI-assisted branding: $0 DIY with AI tools (Midjourney/DALL-E for concepts, Looka/Canva AI for logo, Coolors for palette) to $500-1,000 freelancer for professional polish. Basic brand guidelines for Stoic Mindfulness positioning. Phase 2 refinement $2K-5K optional. One-time branding work.
Noun Project, IconScout. Optional for polish. React Native Vector Icons (FREE) sufficient.

Optional but high ROI for App Store conversion... | AI-assisted video: $0-100 DIY with AI tools (CapCut AI, Runway, screen recording + AI voiceover) to $500-1,000 professional production. Optional but high ROI for App Store conversion. Can defer to post-launch. One-time production.
Large effort (3-5 weeks solo dev time). NO additional tooling costs. Priority Score: 15.6 (HIGH). Enables all analytics features. Plan for 6-12 months. One-time migration project.

Email/password auth via Supabase Auth (FREE). Email delivery $0 (free tier 30K emails/mo) to $5/mo overage. XXL effort (8+ weeks). Blocks 3 features. Priority 2.5. Plan for 6-12 months. One-time development with potential ongoing email costs.
Vercel free + SendGrid free ($0-27/mo pre-revenue) OR Vercel Pro $20 + SendGrid $15 + domain ($40-65/mo post-revenue). For web subscriptions via Stripe. Priority Score: 0 (low urgency).
XXL effort (8+ weeks solo dev time). Your time = $0. Priority Score: 0 (low urgency). Defer until revenue justifies. One-time development project.
Solo content development (FREE). XL effort (5-8 weeks). Priority 3.0. Content enhancement. One-time development.
Development time only. No additional infrastructure. Large effort. Priority 4.7. Feature enhancement. One-time development.
ZERO COST. Custom privacy-preserving analytics (BAA-free, differential privacy Œµ=0.1, k-anonymity k‚â•5). NO third-party vendors (Amplitude, Mixpanel). Saves $2000-5000/month. Currently implemented.
No current ad SDK integration. Future if growth strategy includes paid channels (Apple Search Ads, Google, Meta). Budget when CAC economics justify.
NO attribution SDKs (Adjust, AppsFlyer, Branch). Privacy-first strategy. Future low priority.
Not in current codebase. Future feature if monetization strategy includes affiliates.

User-facing marketing channel: virtual events, webinars, community building for Stoic Mindfulness education and user engagement. $0 pre-revenue (use free platforms like YouTube Live, Zoom free tier). Scale to $500/mo ($6K/yr) post-revenue for conference sponsorships, paid event platforms, speaker fees. Distinct from Professional Development (row 73) which is founder learning. Revenue-dependent - defer until product-market fit validated.

No current marketing infrastructure. Future pre-launch and ongoing content creation. Your time. Timing flexible. | AI-accelerated content marketing: AI assists with blog posts, social content, ASO keyword research, meta descriptions. Your time + AI = 3-5x content velocity vs manual. Tools: Claude for long-form, ChatGPT for ideation, Jasper/Copy.ai for marketing copy ($0 with free tiers). No current marketing infrastructure. Timing flexible.

Business accounting services including: tax preparation, financial reporting, bookkeeping. Base cost ~$1,000/yr for simple solo operation. Scales to $2,000-2,500/yr with increased transaction volume, payroll complexity, or multi-state tax filing. Required for business operation. Does not include bookkeeping software (separate row).
15% (subscriptions after year 1 for retained subscribers), 30% (monthly subscriptions). NOT separate processing fee, taken from revenue. Core revenue model.
15% (first $1M revenue/year), 30% (after $1M revenue/year). NOT separate processing fee. Core revenue model.
Business checking account monthly fees. Required for business operation.
QuickBooks Online, Xero, or Wave. Essential for financial management.
Microsoft 365 Business Standard (email, productivity), Notion (project management). Proton Pass & Proton VPN, Figma
LLC annual reports, business licenses, registered agent fees. Legal requirement.
Annual $99 fee. Required for App Store distribution, Sign in with Apple, TestFlight. Cannot launch without this.
One-time $25 fee. Required for Play Store distribution. Cannot launch Android without this.

Bundled business insurance package: (1) Cyber Insurance - data breach ($1M), privacy liability ($1M), network security ($500K); (2) General Liability - general business, professional liability, errors & omissions; (3) Directors & Officers (D&O) - liability protection for business decisions. Bundled rate saves 10-15% vs separate policies -- (unbundled: Cyber $1K + GL $1.5K + D&O $1.5K = $4K → bundled $3.5-4K). Scales with user base. Advisable for mental health app handling sensitive data.

10% buffer for unexpected costs including: infrastructure failures, emergency fixes, variable cost spikes, seasonal fluctuations, growth surges. Apply to subtotal of all other costs. Prudent financial planning for solo founder.
Only needed when hiring employees. Annual premiums. Not relevant to solo dev model.
Implemented but not primary (IAP-first). For FEAT-38 (web subscriptions). Plus international card fees. Future feature.
$0 using personal phone initially. $50/mo for dedicated business line when revenue justifies. VoIP options (Google Voice free, Grasshopper $26/mo) available.
Supplies, software licenses, unexpected operational costs. Buffer category.
Solo developer + philosopher agent validation for 5 core principles, 4 developmental stages. Your time = $0 in model. Initial core product content development.
11 development markers for tracking user progress through 4 stages. Critical for personalization. Initial development time (your time).

CRITICAL. Initial implementation of crisis detection thresholds (PHQ‚â•15, PHQ‚â•20, GAD‚â•15) and 988 integration. Development/setup time (your time). Always free to user, always available. No external costs.
PHQ-9/GAD-7 implementation accuracy validation (100% required), crisis threshold verification. Automated testing covers this. Launch requirement.
Updates to crisis detection algorithms and safety protocols as clinical standards evolve. Your time. Quality maintenance.
Periodic consultation (quarterly/bi-annually) pluls major content updates for classical source interpretation, framework integrity validation, prevents pop-philosophy dilution. NOT continuous FTE.
Supports user progression through developmental stages (Fragmented, Effortful, Fluid ‚ Integrated). Ongoing content evolution. Essential, not optional.
Updates to neuroscience justification (DMN, attention networks) as research evolves. Maintains scientific credibility but timing flexible.

Clinical safety review by licensed mental health professional (LMFT/psychologist) to assess psychological risk of negative visualization practices for vulnerable users (GAD≥15). Deliverable: Written safety assessment with recommendations. Legal review included in Pre-Launch Legal Package (separate row). Philosophical validation handled internally via classical texts + AI.
Stoic Week, mental health conferences for networking and learning. Annual events. Travel + registration. Optional networking.
Books, academic journals, online courses on Stoicism. Content quality enhancement.
PRIMARY MODEL. Single developer (you) with AI coding assistance. Your time = $0 in model. Core operating model.
Future if specific expertise needed (advanced animations, native modules). $50-150/hr. Trigger: 25K users or critical need. Unlikely.
Future for specialized design work (app redesign, marketing materials). $50-100/hr. Can DIY with AI tools.
Future if product complexity increases. User research, roadmap, feature prioritization. $75-150/hr. Trigger: 50K users. Very unlikely.
PRIMARY development tool for single developer + AI-assisted model. Currently in use. Essential for productivity.
Required for production deployment. Includes unlimited builds + EAS Update (OTA). No separate OTA cost.

Milestone-based database hosting (mutually exclusive tiers): Free tier ($0) - 500MB DB + 2GB bandwidth/mo, supports 10K users/300 DAU with offline-first design; Pro tier ($25/mo, $300/yr) - 8GB DB + 50GB bandwidth + 2M edge functions, for 10K-100K users; Team tier ($599/mo, $7,188/yr) - only if BAA required (architecture pivot) or  >100GB bandwidth, unlikely with privacy-first design. Upgrade only when exceeding free tier limits.
Currently in use. Free for single developer. Upgrade to Team ($4/user/mo) only when hiring.

Milestone-based CI/CD (mutually exclusive tiers): Free tier ($0) - 2,000 minutes/mo, sufficient for 100 commits/mo and 0-5K users; Paid tier ($12/mo, $144/yr) - when exceeding 2,000 min/mo (200 commits/mo), for 5K-50K users. Alternative: self-hosted runners on $5/mo VPS. Includes all test automation. Currently on free tier.
Currently in use. All free/open-source tools. Includes VS Code extensions, Prettier, ESLint.
Included with Expo + Supabase. Required for app operation. Apple Developer Program includes certificates.

Milestone-based error monitoring (mutually exclusive tiers): Free tier ($0) - 5K events/mo, sufficient for 0-1K users; Team tier ($29/mo, $348/yr) - 50K events/mo, for 1K-10K users; Business tier ($99/mo, $1,188/yr) - 500K events/mo, for 10K-100K users. Implement at 500-1K users for production stability. 2025 pricing. Upgrade only when exceeding current tier limits.
Required for FEAT-38 (web subscriptions) and professional email. Annual renewal. Can defer until web feature.
Expo Device Cloud INCLUDED in EAS Build Production plan ($99/mo already budgeted). Access to 100+ real devices. Currently available.
Apple TestFlight FREE. Google Play Internal Testing FREE. For beta users and QA. Continuous testing capability. Launch requirement.
Some free (React Native Accessibility), some paid. WCAG AA compliance testing. Quality enhancement.

Maze or UserTesting.com. Post-launch product validation. Recommended at 5K+ users. Growth-dependent. | AI-augmented user research: Start with AI analysis of App Store reviews, support tickets, and free survey tools (Typeform free, Google Forms) + AI synthesis - $0. Scale to Maze/UserTesting ($99/mo) for structured usability testing at 10K+ users. AI can analyze qualitative feedback, identify patterns, and summarize insights. Growth-dependent.
